name: All I Can See is Juice
name_original: All I Can See is Juice
description:
How to play:

Right and Left Arrow buttons to move right and left
X button to jump (your hair is pink if you can jump)
CTRL+R to force restart game

- Collect the juice by jumping and bouncing off the walls and the hidden obstacles
- Manouevre around the hidden obstacles in your way (their location randomises every time you pickup juice)
- You can see all the juice you collected at the end

There is a bug where the game will just stop sometimes when you collide with the juice. I don't know why this happens to be honest, I've tried a lot of things but nothing worked :|

If this happens, just use CTRL+R to force restart the game. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Also sometimes your character can get stuck colliding between two obstacles and you just have to spam jump to get away from it.
